snippet.title: Verdant Skies Trailer
snippet.description:
How will you live your life on the last frontier?

Immerse yourself in the charming hand-drawn world of Verdant Skies. This life simulation game is made for people who grew up loving Harvest Moon and who long for a game that matured with them. Featuring a diverse cast of characters, you can befriend and/or romance them in both traditional and non-binary gender role relationships. The advanced farming system features plant hybridization options.
